[i]Circadian Beat[/i] – If it's neither day nor night, it becomes day as Constance, Sorcery Incarnate enters.
[i]Bright [/i]– As long as it is day, whenever you cast a instant or sorcery spell, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
[i]Shadow[/i] – As long as it is night, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, cloak target card in your graveyard.
